input_args.passage: 'Old-earth or young-earth belief | CMI takes the stand that the creation is thousands of years old, based on straightforward acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
input_args.claim: 'From source, it is stated that Creation Ministries International (CMI) believes that the creation is thousands of years old, which is a young earth view, based on their straightforward acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
